item.title: 「$125,000 ETH Long Liquidation」 Whale Long Position Faces Approximately $580,000 Unrealized Loss
item.description: On August 18th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), as ETH once again dropped below $4300, the two addresses of the "125K USD Liquidation Long ETH" whale are both in an unrealized loss state, with a total unrealized loss of approximately $580,000. The details are as follows:Address 0xd076...27bb: It holds 23,011 ETH, with an entry price of $4,314.1 and a liquidation price of $4,172.4.Address 0x5f72...da67: It holds 8,752.94 ETH, with an entry price of $4,324.68 and a liquidation price of $4,207.65.

item.title: Avalanche Teams Up with Polmo to Launch Tokenized Whisky, Purchasing the Premium Edition Grants an Invitation to Meet Ava Labs Founder Emin Gün Sirer
item.description: August 18th, as per official information, Bowmore, a renowned Scottish distillery, announced today a partnership with the decentralized open-source Layer1 platform Avalanche to launch the very first on-chain whisky NFT series. This series is scheduled to be officially released on September 30, 2025, during the TOKEN2049 conference in Singapore, and pre-sales will commence from today. By leveraging the Avalanche C chain, each uniquely numbered bottle of whisky will give rise to a corresponding NFT, facilitating the seamless amalgamation of physical rare whisky with digital certificates. The inaugural series encompasses:· Collector's Edition ($5,500): Limited to 8 sets, comprising a 30-year-old Bowmore whisky and custom glassware. Buyers will receive an invitation to meet Ava Labs founder Emin Gün Sirer.· Classic Edition ($180): Limited to 150 bottles of 12-year-old Bowmore, offering an entry-level choice for collectors.Each bottle is equipped with an NFC chip to authenticate its a

item.title: 「$125k Ethereum Long Position Adding to Position on Margin」 Whale Once Again Takes Profit and Increases Position, Position Size Rises to $137M
item.description: On August 18th, according to the monitoring of on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, after a slight rebound in ETH, the "Long ETH with $125,000 Liquidation" whale once again utilized unrealized profits to expand their position. The position size increased from $100 million to $137 million. The current entry price is $4,314, and the liquidation price is $4,207.

item.title: Pendle Hits New All-Time High TVL of $9.2 Billion, Market Adoption and Trust in Pendle Deepen
item.description: August 18th, TN, the founder of Pendle, posted on social media stating that just three weeks prior, Pendle Finance had completed a $1.5 billion asset maturity settlement. Subsequently, the TVL (Total Value Locked) quickly rebounded to a new historical high of $7 billion.Last week, another $898 million in assets matured and Pendle surged once again, setting a new record with a $9.2 billion TVL. During the week of August 14th, approximately $1 billion had already begun to rotate/migrate. Including this settlement, the total amount reached $1.81 billion, making it the second-largest maturity event in Pendle's history. Nevertheless, only $260 million (-2.9%) flowed out and it lasted only for 2 days (August 13th - 15th).The focus of this maturity event is Ethena Labs' USDe (maturing in September 2025), which has now become Pendle's largest pool ever with a TVL of $3.36 billion. This growth was facilitated by:· There being no deposit limit in the market.· Aave raising the deposit limi

item.title: US-listed company AEHL signs strategic agreement with BitGo to advance Bitcoin acquisition and custody.
item.description: On August 18th, the NASDAQ-listed company AEHL announced that its Bitcoin strategy has officially entered the second phase. It has now reached a strategic agreement with BitGo to promote Bitcoin acquisition and custody. The company stated that the purchased Bitcoin will be stored on the blockchain and will continue to fulfill its disclosure obligations, regularly providing updates to the market on its purchase plans, holdings, average acquisition price, and on-chain storage arrangements.

item.title: A whale previously shorted ETH at $2740, currently facing a unrealized loss of $21.5 million
item.description: On August 18th, as per the monitoring of @HyperInsight, a whale (with the address 0x20c2d9...44f5) had previously opened a short position on ETH at $2740 and added $857,000 in margin 5 hours ago. Currently, the position amount of the whale has exceeded $57 million. Affected by market fluctuations, the whale is currently at a floating loss of approximately $21.6 million. If ETH rises to $6073, it will lead to liquidation.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Stocks Open Lower, BNC and BTCS Rise Against the Market on Positive News
item.description: On August 18th, according to data from rockflow (rockflow's website: https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats, with a target of opening the US stock market), the Dow increased by 0.04%, the S&P 500 index dropped by 0.09%, and the Nasdaq fell by 0.06%. Cryptocurrency stocks generally experienced a decline, including:- Coinbase (COIN) decreased by 1.34%.- Circle (CRCL) fell by 0.75%.- MicroStrategy (MSTR) dropped by 0.65%.- Bullish (BLSH) went down by 3.22%.- Bitmine (BMNR) decreased by 3.86%.- BTCS (BTCS) rose by 1.36%.- SharpLink Gaming (SBET) fell by 3.56%.- BNB Network Company (BNC) rose by 9.98%.Among them, the BNB Network Company (BNC) announced today that it will increase its ownership of 125,000 BNB; BTCS announced that it will distribute a one-time blockchain dividend to shareholders in the form of ETH, with a maximum reward of up to $0.4 per share.

item.title: Binance: Partially Resolved Issue of Some Users Unable to Receive PLUME Airdrop
item.description: On August 18th, Binance officials announced via social media that they have successfully addressed the issue where certain users were unable to receive the PLUME airdrop. Eligible users should now have obtained their PLUME HODLer airdrop. The listing of PLUME will continue as originally scheduled.

item.title: 「BNB Version of MicroStrategy」 BNC Announces Addition of 125,000 BNB, Bringing Total Holdings to 325,000 BNB
item.description: On August 18th, as per official information, the fund management business of CEA Industries Inc., BNB Network Company (with the NASDAQ stock code: BNC), announced today that its Strategic Reserve Plan has achieved another significant milestone. The total holdings of BNB have increased to 325,000 coins. This indicates an additional 125,000 coins on top of the initial acquisition of 200,000 coins, further strengthening its status as the world's largest BNB reserve institution.

item.title: ZachXBT: BlockDAG Network as a Scam Project
item.description: On August 18th, on-chain sleuth ZachXBT took to social media to state that the BlockDAG Network is a fraudulent project or an investment scam. This project has been conducting a presale for more than 1.5 years, claiming that the presale is "about to end soon," while regularly transferring investor funds to various exchange accounts and using false data for marketing to fuel the retail FOMO sentiment.
